definition: the quality of lacking any predictable order or plan, emit a noise
details:
noun
- the quality of lacking any predictable order or plan
= synonyms: randomness
- incomprehensibility resulting from irrelevant information or meaningless facts or remarks
= example: incomprehensibility resulting from irrelevant information or meaningless facts or remarks
- the auditory experience of sound that lacks musical quality
= synonyms: racket
- a loud outcry of protest or complaint
= example: a loud outcry of protest or complaint
- sound of any kind, especially unintelligible or dissonant sound
= example: sound of any kind, especially unintelligible or dissonant sound
- electrical or acoustic activity that can disturb communication
= synonyms: disturbance
verb
- emit a noise
= synonyms: make noise, resound
